CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable KalSMS?
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: All new SMS will be forwarded between phone and server
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: New SMS will not be forwarded between phone and server

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Launch automatically?
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: KalSMS will not open when phone boots (but will still forward SMS)
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: KalSMS will open when phone boots

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Keep new messages?
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Incoming SMS will not be stored in Messaging inbox
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Incoming SMS will be stored in Messaging inbox
